VerifySignature - Class in com.nexmo.security
VerifySignature.java

Helper class to assist with verifying sigmatures on inbound message requests Upon receiving a request, the HttpServletRequest object should be passed to the verifyRequestSignature method along with the secret key assigned to your account.
